short_summary: Elevator regulatory maintenance and repair services
description: The Correctional Service of Canada (CSC) is seeking a contractor to provide elevating devices regulatory maintenance and repair services for its institutions and complexes in the Quebec Region. The contractor must provide qualified labor, tools, equipment and, when requested, materials, disposal services and special equipment required to perform elevating devices regulatory maintenance and repair services.

# Government Tender Announcement
## Elevators Regulatory Maintenance and Repair Services
### Contract Title
Title: Elevators Regulatory Maintenance and Repair Services
English: Elevators Regulatory Maintenance and Repair Services
French: Services d'entretiens réglementaires et de réparations des ascenseurs

### Contract Details
Reference: cb-330-27999743
Amended: 6 times
Solicitation Number: 21301-24-4571969
Published Date: January 10, 2024
Closing Date: February 19, 2024, 2:00 PM EST
Amended Date: February 19, 2024
Expected Start Date: March 1, 2024
Expected End Date: December 31, 2025

### Contract Description
**Objective:** Provide regulatory maintenance and repair services for elevators at Correctional Service Canada (CSC) facilities in the Quebec region.

**Services:** The contractor must provide qualified labor, tools, equipment, and materials to perform regulatory maintenance and repairs on elevators. The services must be performed in accordance with CSC's policies and regulations.

**Deliverables:**

* Create and implement a maintenance program
* Compile maintenance records
* Offer emergency services
* Ensure regulatory compliance

### Selection Criteria
The selection criteria for this contract will be based on the lowest price.

**Trade Agreements:**

* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement

### Contracting Entity
Correctional Service Canada
Address: 250 Montée St-François, Laval, QC H7C 1S5
Contact: Kim Lavallée
Email: [kim.lavallee@csc-scc.gc.ca](mailto:kim.lavallee@csc-scc.gc.ca)
Phone: 514-235-9156

### Additional Information
Bid documents and information packages are available on the Canada Buys website. The Crown reserves the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.
